home_game.title: Oil Era - Idle Mining Tycoon
home_game.desc: you can bid to exploit the oil, sell oil and gas, build your own oil refinery and chemical plant, and embark on the road to become an Oil Tycoon!

players_reviews.content: “I love this game, I've been playing since it was released.  Recently I was really enjoying trying to get the different  trophies for completing the  levels with one life. ”
players_reviews.name: Amber Makowski

players_reviews.content: “Omg this is like the best game!! I mean the graphics are good andit's fun to play Also it helps me come over stress. Very satisfying,must play for a long time!”
players_reviews.name: Annette M.

players_reviews.content: “love this game. I play it all the time. Now there are adds I watch to get boosts that help with the levels. It's an easier way to keep moving up the levels. Great game!”
players_reviews.name: GOPAL DAS

players_reviews.content: “Amazing game ever I will say ... It is so relaxing and anxiety free game .... I enjoy playing this game.... Really I can judge it as awesome or no.1 game....”
players_reviews.name: Peter LaBanca

players_reviews.content: “I love this game very much! The levels are both challenging and addictive. Now I'm on like level 120 something and many of the levels I beat say Mastery on the First Try!”
players_reviews.name: Garry Francis

players_reviews.content: “Great fun; super addictive!Still love this game; even after years of playing. I feel like it used to be harder but it's still a good way to waste time. Welcome the challenge. ”
players_reviews.name: Pamela Jones
